name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Sales Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess a strong foundation in **Cybersecurity**, **Network Security**, and **Application Security**, focusing on comprehensive solutions in healthcare and financial sectors. My technical expertise includes pivotal skills such as **TCP/IP**, **HTTP**, **Load Balancing**, and **API Security**. I have experience with top-tier technologies and tools including **Akamai**, **Fortinet**, **F5**, **Imperva**, and **Palo Alto** to enhance application security and performance.

In addition, my background includes **AWS** and **Azure** cloud services, enabling the deployment of secure and scalable solutions. I have successfully communicated complex technical concepts through my excellent **Presentation** and **Negotiation Skills**, ensuring customer satisfaction while driving sales.

Leveraging my knowledge in **DDoS Protection**, **Firewalls**, and **WAF**, I am adept at implementing stringent security measures that comply with industry standards. My passion for technology, along with strong **Customer Service Skills**, equips me to effectively bridge the gap between technical teams and clients, ensuring successful project delivery and enhancement of client relationships.
